name: Parent
descriptions: Parent - the ancestor of an element that is one level higher in the document tree.

name: Pseudo-classes
descriptions: Pseudo-classes: link, visited, hover, active, focus

name: Selectors
descriptions: Types of selectors: by tag, by class, by ID, universal, by attribute

name: Pseudo-elements
descriptions: The :before pseudo-element is applied to display the desired content before the content of the element to which it is added. The :after pseudo-element is used to display the desired text after the content of the element to which it is appended.

name: Child element
descriptions: Child element - a child of an element that is located one level lower in the document tree.
